title: Store wont load, just a black screen.
body: This is honestly annoying, havent played league for about a week and for now, for some reason i cant get into the store. I tried the internet explorer solution but it doesn't work. Ive been fiddling with this for the whole day now and its still black. Even ran the repair option and nothing. Anyone else have the same problem?

replies.body: Recently we noticed that a number of players were getting a strange error every time they tried to open the store. We're working to get to the bottom of the issue, and you can keep updated on our progress on our thread [**here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lKb27XVQ-problems-getting-the-store-to-load).
I've also getting this error.. it's real agitating.
When i switched to the old client there was an error that popped up when i went to the store, but i was able to use it.

It's an error with the certificates renewing for the store (even though I looked up the certificate, and it says it expires 6/5/2017). It will probably be fixed in the next 24 hours, Rito wants you to be able to give them money :)
Right now CloudFlare just gives you a 403 and there's nothing you can do about it without a lot of effort.
I'm having the same problem, when I open the shop it is black. But a security alert pops up, nothing happens when I hit yes or no to proceed or not.
Think its a bug in the new patch/hotfix?
I'm having the same issue at the moment. Tried all the repair suggestions, currently updating windows 10, will apply update and keep you posted
Same, been at this all day and nothing :\

Same problem for me.  I was using it this morning about 8 hours ago and it worked just fine. I did have a Windows defender scan or update happen after i stopped playing.  Do you think they might be related?
Not sure, i just logged in, the game updated and everything works fine. Everything besides the store :|. I didnt scan my computer or anything.
